title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with a simple Pythonic API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat model inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): chat interface, model management, multimodal, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list models with fluent builder-style API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion endpoints for VS Code and other editors.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer-friendly APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, push and list models idiomatically.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo with Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, NVIDIA runtime, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered code explanation, generation and chat side-panel.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG chatbot with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.
